https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hWQfInQkauNbyZRQRxbM7IXm3DF.jpg An outlaw named Guerrero Hernandez is shot in the back and killed whilst attempting to free his half-brother from a small-town prison. Making a deal with the devil, Hernandez returns from the dead to take his revenge. Dead in Tombstone
